content: {"locationId": "12063", "organizationId": "9455", "name": "The Witt House", "address1": "501 W Garland St", "address2": "", "city": "Paragould", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "72450", "country": null, "phone": "870-239-8541", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "36.0534432", "longitude": "-90.4917388", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Pop-Up/Mobile Resource", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Greene County", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Witt House is a community outreach ministry of Paragould First United Methodist Church.  We have been providing food assistance to the residents of Greene County since 2011.  Our mission reflects the overall mission of our church:   Love God, Serve People, Make a Difference.", "notes": "", "contactName": "The Witt House", "contactPhone": "870-573-8101", "contactEmail": "thewitthouse@foodbankagency.org", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 78, "regionName": "Food Bank of Northeast Arkansas", "logoBlobNameSmall": "e00ba642-e03e-4f7c-bce8-32eab9548beb.png", "website": "https://www.foodbankofnea.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 11:00 AM-1:00 PM (Week 1: Hillside Manor/DHS;  Week 2: Pecan Grove;  Week 3: Mini Rise; Week 4: Labor Park)", "Tuesday 4:30 PM-6:00 PM", "Friday 9:30 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
